name: Percent natural land cover in stream buffer
description: This map layer portrays the percent of land within 45 meters of streams, rivers, and other hydrologically connected waterbodies within each subwatershed (12-digit HUC) that has natural land cover. Natural land cover includes forests, shrubs, grasslands, barren land, and wetlands; it excludes agriculture and developed land. For land use/land cover classifications, the conterminous US is based on the EnviroAtlas 2016 Cropland Data Layer-National Land Cover Database hybrid; Alaska is based on the 2016 National Land Cover Database; Hawaii is based on 2005-2011 NOAA Coastal Change Analysis Program (C-CAP) data; Puerto Rico is based on 2010 NOAA C-CAP data; and the US Virgin Islands is based on 2012 NOAA C-CAP data.

name: Roads near streams (km/km)
description: This map depicts the total kilometers of roads within a 45-meter stream buffer distance divided by the total kilometers of streams in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) for 2021.

name: Road Density (km/km2)
description: This map depicts the density of roads in km/km2 in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) for 2021.

name: Roads Crossing Streams - Count
description: This map depicts the number of roads crossing streams in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) for 2021.

name: Roads Crossing Streams - Density (Count per Km of Stream)
description: This map depicts the density of stream-road crossings per stream km in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) for 2021.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as natural
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as natural for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as forest
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as forest for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as shrubland
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as shrubland for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as wetland
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as wetland for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as developed
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as developed for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as agriculture
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as agriculture for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percentage of land area in estimated floodplains classified as agriculture - cropland
description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as agriculture - cropland for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

description: This map shows the percentage of land area in estimated floodplains in the subwatershed (12-digit HUC) classified as rangeland for 2019. NULL values indicate that no floodplain area was found within the hydrologic unit.

name: Percent Housing Units Built Before 1950
description: This map estimates the percent of housing units built before 1950 by census tract. The values were calculated using data extracted from American Community Survey tables (2008-2012).
